title: Pedagogical Agent and Agent-Based Interactive Learning for Improved Learning Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Learners possess intermediate-level expertise in science as general citizens and participate in learning through non-real-time online environments via digital devices. Learning outcomes are measured through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the impact of pedagogical agents' linguistic expressiveness on learning interactions.
Learners apply science concepts and enhance problem-solving skills through agent-based interactive learning.

Based on interactions with a pedagogical agent during three or more project-based assessments in a six-month course, learners can analyze pre-post comparison surveys (5-point Likert scale) and learning outcome data (quiz scores improved by ≥10%, task completion rates ≥80%) to explain the impact of interactions on learning outcomes through three or more specific factors (e.g., engagement, comprehension, problem-solving skills).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
